title: The Flesh Transmitters
description: The 'Harbinger' is expanding into the Undercity by building flesh-transmitters out of captured citizens. You must locate and destroy these nodes to blind the creature.

turns.narrative: Deep in the Undercity, you find three massive pillars of twisted bone and meat acting as radio towers. Captured citizens are wired into the base.
turns.choice_a: Carefully cut the citizens free first (Dexterity)
turns.consequence_a: You save the citizens, but it takes time, allowing a Flesh-Golem patrol to discover you.
turns.choice_b: Plant explosives on the transmitter ignoring the captives
turns.consequence_b: The explosion destroys the node instantly, killing the captives but securing your swift victory.

turns.narrative: If you fought the Golem, it's a brutal melee against a creature that feels no pain and uses static-shocks as attacks.
turns.choice_a: Use slashing weapons on its limbs
turns.consequence_a: Cutting it apart is highly effective. You dismantle the Golem piece by piece.
turns.consequence_b: The lightning supercharges the Golem! It gains an attack buff and deals immense damage.

nodes_destroyed_saved.description: You destroyed the nodes and saved the citizens.

nodes_destroyed_casualty.description: You destroyed the nodes, but sacrificed innocent lives to do so.

conclusion: You destroyed the nodes and saved the citizens.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with significant consequences to the district and involved factions.
